special_abilities.name: Spellcasting.
descriptions: The transmuter is a 9th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 14, +6 to hit with spell attacks). The transmuter has the following wizard spells prepared:

descriptions.raw: Cantrips (at will): light, mending, prestidigitation, ray of frost
descriptions.hyperlinked: Cantrips (at will): light, mending, prestidigitation, ray of frost

descriptions.raw: 1st level (4 slots): chromatic orb, expeditious retreat*, mage armor
descriptions.hyperlinked: 1st level (4 slots): chromatic orb, expeditious retreat*, mage armor

descriptions.raw: 2nd level (3 slots): alter self*, hold person, knock*
descriptions.hyperlinked: 2nd level (3 slots): alter self*, hold person, knock*

special_abilities.name: Transmuter's Stone.
descriptions: The transmuter carries a magic stone it crafted that grants its bearer one of the following effects:
* Darkvision out to a range of 60 feet
* An extra 10 feet of speed while the bearer is unencumbered
* Resistance to acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder damage (transmuter's choice whenever the transmuter chooses this benefit)
If the transmuter has the stone and casts a transmutation spell of 1st level or higher, it can change the effect of the stone.

actions.name: Quarterstaff.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2 (1d6-1) bludgeoning damage, or 3 (1d8-1) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.
